"$(0) Subdual":
"We have an emergency.
Sensors are picking up powerful hostile readings.
Please engage immediately."

"No further hostile readings detected.
Thank you all for your hard work."

"緊急通達。
強力な敵性反応を確認。
早急な撃破をお願いします。"

"敵性反応、消失しました。
各員の努力に感謝します。"

"Alert. Powerful hostile readings have
been detected. Engage immediately."

"We've confirmed that there are no more
hostiles in scanning range. Well done."

"緊急通達だ。
強力な敵性反応が確認された。
早急に撃破しろ。"

"敵性反応の消失を確認。
よくやったな。"

"Emergency! Sensors are detecting
powerful hostile readings!
We have to do something right away!"

"/face2 The hostile readings have disappeared!
Good job, everyone!"

"きっ、緊急通達ですー！
強力な敵さんの反応を確認！
急いで撃破しちゃってくださーい！"

"/face2 敵さんの反応消失ーっと！
みなさん、お疲れ様でしたー！"
